messages.subject: Re: [samuraihistory] Takeda Shingen's 24 Generals DESKTOP NEW IDEA
messages.msgSnippet: Hey, I like the idea 24 generals!  Now if somebody could only come up with an idea for 7 samurai!  Prof Murphy [Non-text portions of this message have been
messages.messageBody:
Hey, I like the idea "24 generals!" Now if somebody could only come up with
an idea for '7 samurai!" Prof Murphy
